title: Homepage About section: add 'Learn more about us' CTA linking to /about

requirements.summary: Add a "Learn more about us" button after the firm overview text in the homepage About section.
acceptanceCriteria: On the homepage, the About section displays a visible button with the exact label "Learn more about us".
The button is located in the About / Firm Overview portion of the section (not the "Our Approach" grid).

file_operations.description: Add a new button labeled "Learn more about us" within the About / Firm Overview block, placing it after the existing overview text content.

requirements.summary: Navigate to the existing About page ("/about") via client-side router when the new button is clicked.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the "Learn more about us" button navigates to the "/about" route and renders the existing AboutPage.
Navigation occurs via the SPA router (no full page refresh).
The URL becomes exactly "/about" after clicking the button.

file_operations.description: Import and use navigate from frontend/src/router/router.ts to wire the "Learn more about us" button click handler to client-side navigation to "/about" (no window.location usage).

requirements.summary: Match existing CTA styling and ensure accessible focus/keyboard interaction for the new button across themes.
acceptanceCriteria: The button is reachable and clickable via keyboard (Tab + Enter/Space).
A visible focus style is present when the button is focused.
The button text is high-contrast and readable in both light and dark themes (no illegible text on background).

file_operations.description: Apply existing CTA styling patterns (e.g., shared Tailwind utility classes / existing .btn-* conventions) and add explicit focus-visible styling (ring/outline) to ensure keyboard focus is clearly visible and text remains readable in light/dark themes.
